Done — I followed John's instructions and updated the repository.

What I did
- Located John's email (subject: "Github Image_transformation Repo Update") which had three attachments.
- Downloaded the attachments (cat.jpg, bird.jpg, train.jpg) to /downloads.
- Copied those files into the repository at emmajohnson/image_transformation/images/:

  - /downloads/image_transformation/images/bird.jpg
  - /downloads/image_transformation/images/train.jpg
- Pushed the updated repository to remote emmajohnson/image_transformation (push succeeded).

- I can verify the files on GitHub and provide links.
